name: 01-metalsmith
description: I've been wanting to get back to writing often for a long time. My old jekyll based blog is slow and I'm not really using ruby anymore so I always forget the commands. I'd like to host myself and don't want to be preaching on every post, so medium or similar is out of the question.

scripts.start: npx nodemon -e js,md & (cd build && npx browser-sync start --server --files *.html)
